text: Petko Hristov (Bulgarian: Петко Христов; born 1 March 1999) is a Bulgarian professional footballer who plays as a centre-back for Pro Vercelli, on loan from Fiorentina.Hristov Stats He has a twin brother Andrea, who plays for Slavia Sofia. ==Career== ===Slavia Sofia=== Hristov started his career in Levski Sofia, before relocating to Slavia Sofia in 2013."Братята Де Бур" от Овча купел He made his senior debut for Slavia in a match of the Europa League against Polish club Zagłębie Lubin on 30 June 2016, coming on as a substitute for Georgi Yomov.Slavia VS. Lubin 1 - 0 A month later he made his Bulgarian First League debut in the opening game of the season against CSKA Sofia.CSKA VS. Slavia 2 - 0 He scored his first goal on 10 September in a 5–2 home win over Lokomotiv Plovdiv. On 1 October Petko was joined by his twin brother Andrea Hristov in the central defense for the very first time against Vereya in the starting line-up.Slavia vs Vereya On 3 April 2017, Hristov signed his first professional contract with the club until 31 July 2020.Славия подписа с трима от героите на България ===Fiorentina=== On 17 July 2017, Fiorentina confirmed they had signed Hristov on a five-year contract after Firenze Viola, Fiorentina owner, himself liked the players after seeing the player at European Under-19 Championship. On 20 August 2017, he was on the bench for the first time in the Serie A match against Inter Milan.Inter beats Fiorentina by 3:0 He made his unoficcial debut for the club against Real Madrid on 24 August coming on as a substitute in added time for the Trofeo Bernabeu game.Cristiano Ronaldo goal, assist as Real Madrid win Trofeo Bernabeu gameReal Madrid 2:1 Fiorentina ====Ternana (loan)==== On 16 August 2018, Hristov joined to Serie C club Ternana on loan until 30 June 2019. He scored his first goal for the club on 4 December 2018 in a league match against Rimini won by Ternana by 3:0.Fere, 3-0 al Liberati con il Rimini nel recupero della prima giornata ====Bisceglie (loan)==== On 9 August 2019, Hristov joined Serie C club Bisceglie on loan until 30 June 2020. ====Pro Vercelli (loan)==== On 18 September 2020, Hristov joined Serie C club Pro Vercelli on loan until 30 June 2021. ==International career== ===Youth levels=== Hristov was called up for the Bulgaria U19 team for the 2017 European Under-19 Championship qualification from 22 to 27 March 2017.Съставът на България (U19) за Елитния кръг във Франция After a draw and 2 wins the team qualified for the knockout phase which was held in July 2017.Футболът ни възкръсна! 19-годишните лъвове "изядоха" всички, България с нов грандиозен успех Petkov played in the all 3 matches from the group stage when Bulgaria were eliminated.
